Text: Thanks, I scanned this with Malwarebytes and MSE prior to installing it and it was fine. It works great on Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit. Simple and effective, however you need to either make a shortcut on you desktop like the info above says, or as I did, go to the install directory {Program Files (x86) for me}, right-click on the .exe and choose "Pin to Start Menu". Alternatively, right-click the book and choose "Open with" SysTools....
